pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tapode nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro “sīsaṁ nahāyissāmī”ti tapodaṁ gantvā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.4_0: “yāvāyyā nahāyantī”ti ekamantaṁ paṭimānesi. Bhikkhū yāva samandhakārā nahāyiṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.5_0: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro vikāle sīsaṁ nahāyitvā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.5_2: kālasseva asambhinnena vilepanena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.7_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ bhagavā etadavoca—“kissa tvaṁ, mahārāja,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.8_0: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.9_0: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.9_1: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.9_2: uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.10_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.11_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū rājānampi passitvā na mattaṁ jānitvā nahāyantī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.14_0: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā rājānampi passitvā na mattaṁ jānitvā nahāyissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.16_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.18_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū uṇhasamaye pariḷāhasamaye kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.4_0: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uṇhasamaye pariḷāhasamaye orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.5_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.6.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.7_1: Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.8_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.4_0: “Pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyāma, tena no phāsu hoti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.5_0: idāni pana ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na nahāyāma, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.7_0: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.8_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.9.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.10_1: Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.11_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū navakammaṁ katvā kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.2_0: Te sedagatena gattena sayanti. Cīvarampi senāsanampi dussati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.5_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.6.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.7_1: Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.8_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū addhānaṁ gantvā kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.2_0: Te sedagatena gattena sayanti. Cīvarampi senāsanampi dussati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.5_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.6.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.7_1: Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.8_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū ajjhokāse cīvarakammaṁ karontā sarajena vātena okiṇṇā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.2_0: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti, kilinnena gattena sayanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.6_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.7.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.8_1: Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.8_0: cuṇṇena vā mattikāya vā nahāyati, payoge payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.15_0: vassānassa paṭhamo māso “iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo”ti nahāyitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.17_0: yassa vinā nahānena na phāsu hoti. Gilānasamayoti nahāyitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.21_0: “addhayojanaṁ gacchissāmī”ti nahāyitabbaṁ, gacchantena nahāyitabbaṁ, gatena nahāyitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.23_1: dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni kāye patitāni honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.2.1_0: Ūnakaddhamāse ūnakasaññī, aññatra samayā, nahāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.2.2_0: Ūnakaddhamāse vematiko, aññatra samayā, nahāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.2.3_0: Ūnakaddhamāse atirekasaññī, aññatra samayā, nahāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
